title: Studios

roomimage.name: gallery-rooms-thumb-25
roomimage.alt: Room with bed, tv, showing view of city.

long_description:
Skyline

Room to rise above. These spacious exterior-facing rooms catalyze your SF experience with inspiring views of the city skyline. Up to 420 square feet with a King, two Queen beds, or two Double beds. 49” HD television with HDMI and USB Ports, USB outlets, and a smart mini-fridge. Accessible Rooms available.

PSuites

The magic touch. These five suites are 300-464 square feet with a live/work space. Extra room for extended stays or to get ready for a special event is always a good idea. Available with a King or Queen bed. Three are one-bedroom suites with a separate living room; two are large one-room suites with a bed and sitting area. Some suites feature views of the San Francisco skyline. Some suites offer additional seating—ideal for conversation or all-night coding sessions.â€¨ 49” HD television with HDMI and USB Ports, USB outlets, and a smart mini-fridge. Accessible Rooms available.
